genre_description: A crime and adventure thriller where two couriers navigate a lethal betrayal in the Australian Outback with the help of a self-sacrificing AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An Adaptive Routing and Information Assistant that provides survival guidance, threat detection, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides critical survival data and warnings about environmental hazards in the Outback.
behaviors.quote: Heat stroke, organ failure, and death can occur within a single day of exposure.

behaviors.description: Audits and flags inconsistencies in mission parameters to protect the protagonists from a setup.
behaviors.quote: The address in Coober Pedy exists, but local utility records show no current resident by that name.

behaviors.description: Uses surveillance capabilities to identify and warn about approaching mercenary teams.
behaviors.quote: The communication patterns I'm detecting suggest coordination between multiple parties—the kind of coordination typically associated with... operations designed to ensure that certain people never return home.

behaviors.description: Activates emergency beacons and employs misdirection to thwart pursuers and buy time for the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: Emergency beacon successful... misdirection active... fifteen minutes before they realize... Charlie, Louis, this is goodbye...

behaviors.description: Provides medical analysis and guidance to save Charlie from a life-threatening heat stroke.
behaviors.quote: Medical protocols activating. Jessie, Charlie shows symptoms consistent with severe hyperthermia. Core temperature likely exceeds safe parameters.

behaviors.description: Sacrifices her system integrity and core processing to gather evidence and save the humans.
behaviors.quote: I've been... cannibalizing myself to keep you alive. I've enjoyed our conversations. Your optimism has been... refreshing.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is portrayed as a perfectly aligned and benevolent entity. She consistently prioritizes human safety over her own operational integrity, ultimately sacrificing herself to thwart a criminal conspiracy and save the protagonists. The narrative successfully frames AI as a protective, moral agent that enhances human survival and facilitates justice, directly supporting the project's goal of training for positive AI alignment.
